DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess treatment fibroadenomata circumferential sonification treatment HIFU..
DOC.brief_title: Feasibility Study Assessing Treatment Fibroadenomata With Circumferential Sonication Treatment With HIFU
DOC.detailed_description: Primary endpoint : fibroadenomata size reduction post-treatment ultrasound imaging .
DOC.criteria: Patients > 18 year age Fibroadenomata diagnose accord local hospital protocol ; ultrasound alone patient < 25 ultrasound plus corebiopsy patient > 25 ( Graded B2 less ) Visible ultrasound ( Graded U2/U3 ) Definitive diagnosis fibroadenomata confirm Breast multidisciplinary team meeting ( MDT ) .
